properties.name: beacon's closet
properties.description: Posted by Dvd88 N 11th St, Brooklyn, NYgreat prices and good selection. love this store!! also check out park slope location.

properties.name: beacon's closet
properties.description: Posted by Dvd220 5th Ave, Brooklyn, NYnot as big or as organized as the williamsburg location..but still has some great stuff. good excuse to take a trip out to park slope.

properties.name: bungalow 8
properties.description: Posted by Dvd515 W 27th St, New York, NYuber trendy celeb spot. good cocktails and chill vibe.

properties.name: fix lounge
properties.description: Posted by Dvd110 Bedford Ave, Brooklyn, NYgood coffee and cool lounge. wasn\'t expecting a full bar inside when i walked in...but i guess that\'s cool.

properties.name: fried dumpling
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 99 Allen St, New York, NYthe best dumplings!! and so cheap!! 5 dumplings for . also try wonton soup () and sesame fried pancake (sh.50). best deal in NY.

properties.name: hudson bar at the hudson hotel
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 356 W 58th St, New York, 10019uber trendy and modern bar that somehow maintains a chill vibe.

properties.name: magnolia bakery
properties.description: Posted by Dvd401 Bleecker St, NYpass on the cupcakes. sprinkles in LA is WAY better. however the banana pudding is SOOOO good. sounds kinda gross, but don\'t knock it till you try it. i don\'t even like banana flavored stuff!!

properties.name: perch cafe
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 365 5th Ave, Brooklyn, NYcute place with good coffee. love the bird motif. haven\'t tried the food.

properties.name: pommes frites
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 123 2nd Ave., New York City, NY 10003fries!! lots of different dips. try curry ketchup.

properties.name: pop burger
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 60 9th Ave, New York, NYfuturistic mini burger joint. don\'t forget to get extra pop sauce for your fries. cocktails available in the back lounge.

properties.name: say cheese
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 649 9th Ave, New York, NYgrilled cheese sandwiches and the best tomato soup. .50 soup/sandwich combo.

properties.name: teany
properties.description: Posted by Dvd90 Rivington St, New York, NYmoby owned vegetarian tea house. cute space and extensive tea selection.
